main_definition: To remove (liquid) from a container or area, causing it to become depleted of the liquid.

meanings_and_examples.example: The plumber fixed the leaky pipe so that the water would no longer drain from the basement.
After a series of bad investments, his savings began to drain rapidly.
The long hike drained their energy and they needed to rest for the remainder of the journey.
Hearing about all the challenges ahead, she felt her enthusiasm drain away.
